name: maloja
description: Maloja is a self-hosted music listening tracker, similar to Last.fm. It tracks play history locally and offers detailed stats, charts, artist history, and API accessâ€”all without third-party tracking.
features: Scrobble tracking: Record every song you listen to with timestamps and metadata for personal analytics.
Statistics dashboard: View listening trends, top artists, albums, and tracks over customizable time periods.
API compatibility: Compatible with Last.fm scrobbling clients and supports standard scrobbling protocols.
Charts and graphs: Visualize listening habits with interactive charts showing patterns over time.
Artist pages: Browse detailed statistics for individual artists including play counts and history.
Privacy focused: All data stays on your server with no third-party tracking or data sharing.
Manual scrobbling: Add or edit scrobbles manually for offline listening or corrections.
Import functionality: Import existing scrobble history from Last.fm or other services.
Multi-user support: Track listening for multiple users with separate profiles and statistics.
Pulse feed: See real-time updates of what you and other users are currently listening to.
Tag support: Organize music with custom tags and view statistics by genre or mood.
Export options: Download your complete listening history in standard formats for backup or analysis.
